casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Earl ASKEW 133P15-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 24, 2018 Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. William Earl Askew, for Askew, William Earl. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State.

*392The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of September 2018 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of October 2018."
